definition: person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
central room of a traditional Chinese house
lit. love the house and its crow (idiom); involvement with sb and everyone connected/Love me, love my dog.

sentences.english: Placing dead bodies in a bone room.
sentences.chinese: 将尸体放置在尸骸存放屋。

sentences.english: The door of the room was shut. The Princess wanted to go in and see what was in this room.
sentences.chinese: 这间屋的门关着，公主要进去看看这间屋子里有什么。

sentences.english: But probably the most familiar form of miniaturization is the dollhouse .
sentences.chinese: 也许大家最熟悉的袖珍艺术的形式还是玩具屋吧。

sentences.english: To marry a woman for her style is like buying a house for its paint.
sentences.chinese: 由于面貌美丽而娶妻，犹如油漆漂亮而买屋。

sentences.english: I with stone, the Hao arrived at that"house" and open a door to go in.
sentences.chinese: 我用石材啊郝离开《屋》啊翻开门出来。

sentences.english: Guest room style mahjong room is on F5 of main building, used for accommodation and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 客房式麻将屋位于主楼5楼，集住宿娱乐于一体。

sentences.english: The reign of "House Of Cards" may be short-lived.
He studied English while staying at Oxford Thrangu House.
sentences.chinese: 随后，他前住英国创古牛津屋学习英语。

sentences.english: The earth house 002 is a house with lightweight structure plus Straw-Clay wall.
sentences.chinese: 地球屋002号为轻钢屋架加草泥填充墙。

sentences.english: A cloud is above my house.
His studies of volcanoes on the Fijian island of Kadavu indicated they had not been active for tens of thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 他研究斐济卡达屋岛上据称几万年未活动的火山。

sentences.english: Hand-woven straw hats take a sunbath under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 手工编织的草帽，在屋前排好队，进行日光浴。

sentences.english: Guests can also free use the brandnew hot spring baths with a appointment.
sentences.chinese: 住宿贵宾可不限次数预约无偿使用全新私人风吕汤屋。

sentences.english: She unlocked the door and I followed her into the apartment and into the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 她打开门，我跟着她进了屋，去了厨房。

sentences.english: Berlin’s squatter movement reached its apogee 30 years ago in the west.
sentences.chinese: 在西柏林，寮屋运动30年前达到高峰。

definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
central room of a traditional Chinese house
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
